gazette.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an official newspaper, especially one from the government giving important lists of people who have been employed by them etc
gazette.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used in the names of some newspapers
gazette.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a newspaper, often one listing official announcements such as legal notices or the names of people who have taken up a position in government. The word ‘Gazette’ is often used in newspaper titles
gazette.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Before any new statute can be enacted, it must be announced in the official gazette.
